name: A soiled icon of bone
data: It increases the users dexterity like a god.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It gives great bonus to the skill 'whirlwind attack'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely fast.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'critical'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
